attributes.action: I call for a referendum on assisted dying as I believe it’s to important issue
attributes.additional_details: My mother in law and quite a few of my friends and family have suffered through cancer, people must have a say in how they wish to live or die
attributes.background: This bill is so important to not let the general public have their chance to air their opinions or beliefs, be it for or against, this bill is a bill, for all to decide not just MP

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about the experience that your friends and family have gone through.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: 

We are petitioning for a National Referendum on Assisted Dying
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701838
